title: Wanna ask query related you tube. Wanna ask does "save to watch later" videos comes under storage
content:
Hi all.  
Need ur urgent guidance in terms of getting reply for below mentioned 3 questions. 

1. Does videos in u tube which we save under save to watch later" are counted in phone storage? 
2. In case if we clear u tube storage option in phone...I feel it will omit all the save to watch later options as well as download in u tubes..am I right?
3. In case if it will remove all options under storage of u tube including both download s and save to watch later videos in order to create space in phone storage, will it permanently remove my save to watch later videos and downloaded videos in u tube irrespective in which device I open u tube or else I can certainly watch them in other devices like pc, laptop or tablet or any other handset but not in my phone where I removed their storage ?
?
Would love to receive quick guidance if feasible and truly grateful to the person in advance for sharing the same. Waiting for reply.. with gratitude and warm regards! Gurpreet!
